record.id: field.name="switchover" and file.name="tzfile" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: switchover
record.file.name: tzfile

brief.brief: The date/time when the time zone switches from one defined time to another, for example, from its standard time to Daylight Savings Time (DST). Note that the date/time format must be in the 'mm/dd/yy [hh]:[mm]:[ss] ' format. Otherwise, switchover dates will not be correctly processed in date/time calculations.

The index number of the time change definition to which the time zone switches at the specified switchover time. The first definition listed in the Time Change Definitions table is numbered 0, the second is 1, and the third is 2, and so on.
